name: RECONCILE_SVC_CTCD
description: This table contains line-level category codes received through claims reconciliation. This information is only populated if the line-level category code was mapped to an Epic category value.

columns.name: CLAIM_RECON_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the claim reconciliation record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this contact in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date of the record, in external format.

columns.name: LN_CATEGORY_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: Line-level status category code. This value is only populated if the line-level status code matches a category abbreviation inside of the system.
entries: Unmapped code received
Supplemental Messages
Acknowledgement/Forwarded-The claim has been forwarded to another entity.
Acknowledgement/Receipt-Claim has been received. Not accepted for adjudication
Acknowledgement/Acceptance into adjudication system
Acknowledgement/Returned as unprocessable claim
Acknowledgement/Not Found-Claim can not be found in the adjudication system.
Acknowledgement/Split Claim-Claim split upon acceptance into adjudication system
Acknowledgement/Rejected for Missing Info - Missing info specified in Status
Acknowledgement/Rejected for Invalid Info - Specified in the Status details
Pending: Adjudication/Details
Pending/In Process-The claim or encounter is in the adjudication system.
Pending/In Review-The claim/encounter is suspended pending review.
Pending/Requested Information-Claim is waiting for info already requested
Pending/Patient Requested Information
Finalized-Claim completed adjudication cycle - no more action will be taken.
Finalized/Payment-The claim/line has been paid.
Finalized/Denial-The claim/line has been denied.
Finalized/Revised - Adjudication information has been changed
Finalized/Forwarded-Any applicable payment made - claim has been forwarded
Finalized/Not Forwarded-Any applicable payment made. Claim NOT forwarded
Finalized/Adjudication Complete - No payment forthcoming
Finalized/Cannot Process
Requests for additional Information/General Requests
Requests for additional Information/Entity Requests
Requests for additional Information/Claim/Line
Requests for additional Information/Documentation
Request for additional info/more specific detail- Info received was inadequate
General Questions (Yes/No Responses)
Response not possible - error on submitted request data
Response not possible - System Status
Information Holder is not responding; resubmit at a later time.
Entity not found - change search criteria
